title: Home | LeMaitre
text: Follow Us Game-changing vascular surgery solutions since 1983. This is the copy. "The LeMaitre Valvulotome has revolutionized the in situ bypass…It’s gone from being one of my options to really being my sole option." Bryan C. Kramer, MD As of May 1, 2025 LeMaitre Valvulotome units sold in the last 10 years. At LeMaitre, we're making a meaningful difference in people's lives. Every day.
